definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Water contracts until its temperature reaches 4℃.
sentences.chinese: 直到水溫達到4℃時，水才停止收縮。

sentences.english: During this period, the company expects to bring the water temperature in the reactors fully under control.
sentences.chinese: 這段時間，公司將完全控制反應堆的水溫。

sentences.english: The most famous hot spring in Tengchong, quantity, water temperature high, sulfur-rich quality.
sentences.chinese: 騰衝的溫泉最著名，數量多，水溫高，富含硫質。

sentences.english: Recommends the control scheme by monitoring the return water temperature.
sentences.chinese: 推薦採用熱水回水溫度控制方案。

sentences.english: In winter, the refrigerating device can be powered on to decrease the water temperature.
sentences.chinese: 在夏季還可開啓製冷裝置降低水溫。

sentences.english: The water temperature originates in geothermy warming rate and the radioactive element decay has the heat energy.
sentences.chinese: 水溫來源於地熱增溫率及放射元素的衰變產生熱能。

sentences.english: He legs cramped because the temperature of the swimming pool was too low.
sentences.chinese: 由於游泳池水溫太低，她的腿搐搦了。

sentences.english: That change in water temperature has lowered a physiological barrier that has kept the crabs in check.
sentences.chinese: 水溫的這一變化使控制蟹類的生理學屏障削弱了。

sentences.english: Warmer oceans and over-fishing are affecting sea life.
sentences.chinese: 海洋水溫的提高以及過度捕撈嚴重影響着海洋生物。

sentences.english: Here spring the surface water temperature of 33 degrees to 36 degrees.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的泉水錶面水溫在33度至36度之間。

sentences.english: The thermometric shower nozzle has the advantage that the shower water temperature can be rapidly known.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型的有益效果是，能迅速知道淋浴水溫。

sentences.english: A hot & cold mixer is used to make the water temperature comfortable.
sentences.chinese: 冷熱水調節器是用於使水溫適宜。

sentences.english: Also, high temperature in high flow season strengthened secondary release of OCPs from sediment to water.
sentences.chinese: 水溫升高加強了沉積物中有機氯農藥的二次釋放。

sentences.english: These currents control more than water temperature. They transport distant marine life as well.
sentences.chinese: 這些洋流不僅控制着水溫，還運送着遙遠的海洋生物。

sentences.english: The water temperatures vary from 39℃ to 73℃.
sentences.chinese: 溫泉水溫由攝氏39度至73度不等。

sentences.english: Heat some water with an alcohol lamp. What happens to the water temperature?
sentences.chinese: 有酒精燈加熱一些水。水溫發生什麼變化？

definition: to heat/to add warmth/to raise temperature/fig. to stimulate
concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution)/consistency/thickness/density/viscosity
